items.content_html: The validate-kit is a lightweight JavaScript package that simplifies user input validation, covering email addresses, phone numbers, URLs, usernames, passwords, confirm passwords, date of birth, credit card numbers, postal codes, social security numbers, and custom rules.

items.content_html: This is a lightweight FE framework. It is written in the TypeScript language. The codebase was documented with JSDoc and compiled with ESbuild advanced settings. In this framework there are a lot of predefined UI components.
